scripts.api-build: yarn run api-lint && cd lufo-api ; rm -rf lib ; babel -q src/ -d lib/ ; flow-copy-source src lib
scripts.api-test: yarn run api-build && cd lufo-api ; jasmine
scripts.api-pack: yarn run api-build && cd lufo-api ; yarn pack
scripts.api-doc: yarn run api-lint && cd lufo-api ; rm -rf docs ; documentation build src/** -f html -o docs
scripts.cli-build: yarn run cli-lint && cd lufo-cli ; rm -rf lufo.js ; babel -q src/ -d . ; chmod +x lufo.js
scripts.cli-test: yarn run cli-build && cd lufo-cli ; jasmine
scripts.cli-pack: yarn run cli-build && cd lufo-cli ; yarn pack
